title:
Curvature estimates for semi-convex solutions of asymptotic Plateau
  problem in $\mathbb{H}^{n+1}$
abstract:
In this paper, we consider the asymptotic $\sigma_k$ Plateau problem in
hyperbolic space. We establish $C^2$ estimates for semi-convex complete
hypersurfaces satisfying constant $\sigma_k$ curvature with a prescribed
asymptotic boundary at the infinity for $2\leq k\leq n-2$ . The result is based
on a new crucial concavity inequality derived for hessian equations.
